ResearchProjectDef.label: RimCoffee™ Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the benefits of Pholiota-derived drinks. Create RimCoffee™ beverages that enhance energy, uplift mood, and increase productivity, helping researchers, colonists, and workers maintain peak performance in their daily tasks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Combat RimCoffee™ Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Master the art of combat enhancements. Combat RimCoffee™ Production unlocks the ability to create experimental brews like RimCoffee™ Prototype W.B-13, incorporating Pholiotox Compound-13 for extreme combat boosts. These unstable stimulants offer incredible power.
